assessmentQuestionVersion.name: HUS_For_DeNovo_Initial_Drug_Information_Q4
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Instructions: • For an initial application, complete section A • For continuation at 6 months, complete Section B • For continuation at 12 months, complete Section C • For reinstitution after eculizumab withdrawal, complete Section D • For annual renewal for ongoing treatment, complete Section E All patients need to be reassessed at 6 months, 12 months and then yearly for continuation or discontinuation of eculizumab. Approval duration for eculizumab may be individualized based on the clinical circumstance.
